Hachiko-Android
Database Keys <--> users dog_name dog_breed owner_name owner_location
Main Activity <--> OTP LOGIN GOOGLE LOGIN GUEST LOGIN GOOGLE SIGN IN
Login Activity <--> SEND OTP
OTP Activity <--> OTP cannot be empty OTP is too short USER EXIST INCORRECT OTP Enter your phone number Verifying your number We have sent an OTP to RESEND OTP Wait for OTP(sec) : OTP has been resent OTP received OTP Verified OTP SIGN IN
SignUp Activity <--> Sign Up Enter Owner\'s Location Enter Dog\'s Breed Enter Owner\'s Name Enter Dog\'s Name All fields are mandatory!! USER ADDED SUCCESSFULLY USER ADDITION FAILED
